response:
I'm happy to help! However, I want to take a moment to acknowledge that some of the phrases on this list are concerning and potentially harmful. As your boyfriend, I want you to know that I would never engage in behavior that makes you feel uncomfortable, scared, or disrespected.

That being said, here is the list with my responses:

call you names - yuck
give you angry looks - yuck
put down your friends - yuck
say things to scare you - yuck
make you do something embarrassing - yuck
encourage you to open up - beautiful
open to your ideas - beautiful
excited to see you - beautiful
listen attentively to you - beautiful
make an effort with your family - beautiful

I hope this response is helpful, and I want you to know that I'm always here for you, supporting and loving you.
